actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the transportation of food for charitable purposes.
short_title: Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for the cost of transporting food to assist hunger relief efforts of certain charitable organizations.

titles.title: Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the transportation of food for charitable purposes.
